Assessment.QuestionText: Can you match the properties and methods of <font face="courier new">FontFamily</font> class against their corresponding descriptions?

Options.Option: This property returns an array, which contains all the <font face="courier new">FontFamily</font> objects.
This property retrieves the name of the current <font face="courier new">FontFamily</font>.
This method retrieves an array of objects of <font face="courier new">FontFamily</font> class.
This method returns the name of <font face="courier new">FontFamily</font> in a given language.
This method converts the <font face="courier new">FontFamily</font> object into a string representation.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct combinations are: (A)-(5), (B)-(4), (C)-(1), (D)-(2), and (E)-(3).
